mn136:2.7: mā hevaṁ, āvuso potaliputta, avaca → idaṁ vākyaṁ sya-all, km potthakesu
mn136:2.9: Atthi ca kho → atthi ceva kho (mr)
mn136:2.12: nāma evaṁnavo bhikkhu → nāmevaṁ navo bhikkhu (bj); navakena bhikkhunā (mr)
mn136:6.5: ummaṅgaṁ → ummaggaṁ (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed); umaṅgaṁ (mr)
mn136:6.13: byākaramāno → idaṁ padaṁ bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed potthakesu
mn136:9.8: micchā tesaṁ ñāṇan’ti → micchā te sañjānanti (mr)
